body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Torres Auto. My name is Roger Torres. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Grace. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I ordered a car part online and it still hasn't arrived. I'm feeling frustrated.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Grace. Could you please provide me with your order number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Grace. Can you also confirm the shipping address associated with the order?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The shipping address is five six seven Elm Street, Cityville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Grace. I will look into this matter for you. Your patience is appreciated.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Grace. We will contact you as soon as we have an update. Have a great day!
